summary: 2002 VW PASSAT - ENGINE PROBLEMS FOR A BRAND NEW CAR.  ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON TWICE IN LESS THAN 2 MONTHS.  IGNITION COIL PROBLEM THAT ALL PASSAT OWNERS SEEM TO BE EXPERIENCING.  THIS PROBLEM IS TOO DANGEROUS FOR PASSAT DRIVERS.  WE SHOULD NOT HAVE TO BE AFRAID OF DRIVING A BRAND NEW CAR.  THIS IS A RECALL SITUATION FOR VW.
